description:
Misaki can`t help but wonder... are he and Akihiko actually "going out"? They don`t seem to have the kind of lovey-dovey relationship that most couples do. So Akihiko settles the problem swiftly, by declaring that they`re going out on a date!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kawaii Ko ni wa Tabi o Saseyo
Spare the Rod and Spoil the Child
可愛い子には旅をさせよ
